Articles L. 225-100-1 and L. 22-10-35 of the French Commercial Code
· Analysis of business trends
· Analysis of results
· Analysis of financial position
· Key financial and non-financial performance indicators related to the Company's specific business, such as information pertaining to environmental issues and personnel matters

· Internal control and risk management procedures
· Company hedging objectives and policy, and exposure to price, credit, liquidity and cash flow risks
Article L. 225-211 of the French Commercial Code:
· Buyback by the Company of its own shares
